Illya, Queen of Night.evoEffect_:
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore this follower's defense.
Illya, Queen of Night.baseFlair_: Haahahahahaa! Well done, worm! Very impressive, awakening me! As thanks, perhaps I'll grant you the honor of becoming my servant!
Illya, Queen of Night.evoFlair_: Only the queen of the night could ever possess such beauty, such dignity. Kneel at my feet and bask in my presence. You could ask no greater honor than to serve Illya Ornstein!

Blood Rage.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Deal 6 damage instead if Vengeance is active for you.
Blood Rage.baseFlair_: Blood will be paid for in blood.

Venomous Bite.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Serpent into your hand.
Venomous Bite.baseFlair_: This poison could kill you four times over with more to spare. —Snake handler

Blood Drinker's Brand.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a follower and give it Drain if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
If Vengeance is active for you, recover 2 play points.
Blood Drinker's Brand.baseFlair_: This time for man has come to an end—let us usher in a new era.

Crimson Desire.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Recover 1 evolution point.
Crimson Desire.baseFlair_: Thirst for eternity, drink for eternity.

Viper Lash.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. Summon a Serpent.
Enhance (6): Summon 4 Serpents instead.
Viper Lash.baseFlair_: If bitten by the viper, alert those around you and immediately isolate yourself. It's not to save your life; it's to save theirs. The poison dripping from your open wound will soon attract other snakes. —Creatures That Won't Mind If You Die, Serpents and Such

Cursebrand Strike.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Summon a Cursebrand Vampire.
If Vengeance is active for you, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Cursebrand Strike.baseFlair_:
May blood and pain blot out the light of the moon.
—Cursebrand Vampire

Sadistic Night.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader. Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (7): Then summon a Beast Dominator.
Sadistic Night.baseFlair_: This thirst simply refuses to be quenched... Won't you give me what I crave?

Lethal Blade.baseEffect_:
Select an enemy follower. Whenever the follower attacks, it will deal 3 damage to itself.
If Vengeance is active for you, give this effect to all enemy followers instead.
Lethal Blade.baseFlair_: The ghostly white blade sliced through the sickly jet darkness, running through its target like a needle through cloth. —"Night", Poems of Cruelty

Trial of the Gorgons.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Serpents.
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venomfang Medusa, Euryale, or Stheno.
Trial of the Gorgons.baseFlair_: Our trial is a gift. You should revel in it.

Relinquish Reason.baseEffect_: Give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand. Then if Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your deck.
Relinquish Reason.baseFlair_: Only instinct can break the shackles of reason.

Unleash the Nightmare.baseEffect_:
Put 2 random followers from your deck into your hand.
Summon a Forest Bat for each non-Machina follower added to your hand. Then summon an Assembly Droid for each Machina follower added to your hand.
Unleash the Nightmare.baseFlair_: I had a nightmare, so I woke up, and then I went to the window to make sure it wasn't true, but there they were. Just like in my nightmare. —Boy from the fog-filled village

Demon Key.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost followers from your hand into play.
Demon Key.baseFlair_: Drip, drop, drink, drink, key to the door to carnality! Bones, blood, bodies, breath, come hither unto me! —Bloodlock Manuscript

Throne of Solitude.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, if only 1 allied follower is in play, give a random allied follower +1/+1 and Ward.
Throne of Solitude.baseFlair_: A king of men rules through the favor of his subjects, his path strewn with the petals of his citizens' respect. The king of blood, however, rules through the favor of the night, his path paved with individual ambition.

Sanguine Core.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, restore 10 defense to your leader, then banish this amulet.
Sanguine Core.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated blood. Those who seek completion find themselves drawn to its luster.

Prison of Pain.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
Prison of Pain.baseFlair_:
Using pain as a tool to oppress the people? Utterly preposterous. This is merely a bit of good old-fashioned torture as decreed by the heavens, indeed.
—Heretic Priest

Dire Bond.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader and draw a card.
Dire Bond.baseFlair_: The taste of sin is bittersweet.

Blood Moon.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
Fanfare: Activate Vengeance for you even if your leader's defense is more than 10. This effect lasts until this amulet leaves play.
Blood Moon.baseFlair_: Thus begins a night of inhumanity.

Dark General.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
Dark General.baseFlair_: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
Dark General.evoFlair_: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

Exella, Dark General.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
Exella, Dark General.evoEffect_: (This card will be treated as Dark General.)
Exella, Dark General.baseFlair_: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
Exella, Dark General.evoFlair_: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

Raging Giant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
Raging Giant.baseFlair_: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. Nothing is more ferocious than a wounded giant.
Raging Giant.evoFlair_: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. A giant, once drunk on blood, is unstoppable.

Barbaric Demon.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Barbaric Demon.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Barbaric Demon.baseFlair_: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your dying day.
Barbaric Demon.evoFlair_: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your soul departs this world.

Moriana the Bejeweled.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover 1 evolution point if Vengeance is active for you.
Moriana the Bejeweled.baseFlair_: So this is one of the prism stones. It's beautiful. The warding magic within is sure to keep anyone safe. Would you like to take it with you?
Moriana the Bejeweled.evoFlair_: I've never given anyone a present before, but I'd like you to have this, hero. I hope you like it. It's something my first friends and I found together: a prism stone.

Assault Werewolf.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has Ward.
Assault Werewolf.evoEffect_: Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has Ward.
Assault Werewolf.baseFlair_: "If you value your life, take off your armor." With the werewolf warriors before him, the elderly commander muttered the order. "Those beasts go after the ones who are harder to crush first."
Assault Werewolf.evoFlair_: "If you value your life, do not resist." The elderly commander curled his lips back as he put his hands up. "If they think you're easy to crush, your life will be spared."

Devil Hand.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower, and give a random allied follower +2/+2.
Devil Hand.baseFlair_: Groar... (As an all-powerful demon known across the netherworld, a great offering is required to summon me properly. Otherwise, this is what you receive.)
Devil Hand.evoFlair_: Groargh... (That summoner has run off... I must find them to return to the netherworld. This form is so cumbersome though... I could really use another hand!)

Swordserpent Guardian.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Serpents.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Give Bane and Rush to all allied Serpents.
Swordserpent Guardian.baseFlair_: The serpent's path is winding. What business have you in this cave, little lost sheep? Very well. I shall guide you to the serpent god you seek.
Swordserpent Guardian.evoFlair_: Poke a bush and a snake may slither out. I know not what business you had with the serpent god... but it matters little. After all, you're about to be sacrificed to him.

Zealot of Lust.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Then deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Zealot of Lust.baseFlair_: Go forth and convulse en masse. Come one, come all—old and young, gods and demons. Climax and intermingle, for you and your neighbor are but one and the same.
Zealot of Lust.evoFlair_: From the shadow of provision comes forth unity. Bonded through desire, bound by lust—beasts, gods... all are united through pleasure. Rejoice, for you are one with the world.

Berserk Demon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain the ability to ignore Ward.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 6 attack, gain Rush.
Berserk Demon.baseFlair_: Why does he train? Why does he lust for strength? Why does he fight? There are no answers to such questions. A berserker simply swings his axe.
Berserk Demon.evoFlair_: At the end of the training, the fighting, and the quest for strength, lies meaning for the berserker. Having swung his axe, he finds the answers he seeks.

Bloodstained Berserker.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If any other allied Bloodstained Berserkers have been played this match, gain Storm.
Bloodstained Berserker.baseFlair_: Not so fast. I take payment up front, milord. Oh, it's not much... Just a bit of pain and fresh, steaming blood. What? Don't have the nerve to pay?
Bloodstained Berserker.evoFlair_: I've received your payment of... Ah yes. An ounce of pain and a pound of blood, with all the rancor oozing forth. Oh, and you needn't worry. I'll see the mission through—I swear it on your life.

Curmudgeon Ogre.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Give +1/+1 to all allied Bloodcraft followers. If Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+2 instead.
Curmudgeon Ogre.baseFlair_: Mortal commanders rally their troops with charisma and compensation. A demonic commander inspires his underlings with dread and duress.
Curmudgeon Ogre.evoFlair_:
"Even now, everything makes me jumpy."
"I wake up wondering, 'How did I survive?'"
"A demon even demons feared."
"Never accept his invitation to dine. Never."
—Excerpts from the Psych Evals of Retired Soldiers

Wardrobe Raider.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Then restore 2 defense to your leader.
Wardrobe Raider.baseFlair_: Strength, beauty—these are my desires, and it is only the magic armor that can fulfill them. With each drop of blood it absorbs, it becomes more glowingly beautiful!
Wardrobe Raider.evoFlair_: No, it's still not enough. More sacrifices must be made! Monsters, dragons, angels—everything must be sacrificed in the name of strength and beauty! I pray for the blood that will make me beautiful!

Geryon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if Vengeance is active for you.
Geryon.baseFlair_: "Contaminate the earth..." "Devour human souls..." "Return the world to darkness..."
Geryon.evoFlair_: "My right hand devours the light..." "My left hand repels all hope..." "The weak deserve only death..."

Labyrinth Devil.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
Labyrinth Devil.baseFlair_: I'm a devil. An adorable devil who gets adventurers like you lost so I can toy with them.
Labyrinth Devil.evoFlair_: Confusion, exhaustion, and finally starvation. When adventurers despair, I take them out of their misery. To us, despair is the most delicious spice there is!

Euryale.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Fanfare: Give an allied Bloodcraft follower resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Euryale.baseFlair_:
As fluid as she is sharp, her sword pierces her enemies like a snakebite.
"Trespassing isn't permitted in my territory!"
Euryale.evoFlair_:
She commands a magic serpentine blade, giving her power over life and death.
"I won't let you lay a hand on my sisters!"

Dark Elemental.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If an allied follower was destroyed this turn, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Last Words: Deal 4 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Dark Elemental.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 4 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Dark Elemental.baseFlair_:
Look closely at that face... it is stricken by both rage and sadness. It weeps over the cruel future awaiting you, and simmers with rage at its eternal hunger.
—Prologue, At the Shadows' Edge
Dark Elemental.evoFlair_:
If its sadness cannot be abated, it must be razed by anger. The anger that goes uncalmed will be drowned in sadness. Whichever the elemental's humor, your best strategy is avoidance.
—Chapter 2, At the Shadows' Edge

Mechaforge Devil.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Assembly Droid into your hand.
Mechaforge Devil.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Repair Mode into your hand. Recover 2 play points.
Mechaforge Devil.baseFlair_:
Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. The Metal-Blade Demon, for example, arms its body and binds itself with steel. Some others cover their kin in iron and force them to serve.
—Secrets of Sorcery Demystified II
Mechaforge Devil.evoFlair_:
Losing yourself to rage and swinging your strength about? There once was a time when I did that too. It's different now with children in my life. But it isn't so bad. I've grown rather fond of the little ones.
—Mechaforge Devil to Metal-Blade Demon

Yuna, Vampire Seeker.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand.
Yuna, Vampire Seeker.baseFlair_: Yeek! W-was that a vampire!? No... wait... It was just my own footsteps. Yeesh... I'll never make it if I keep jumping at shadows like this. That's right... I've gotta work hard if I'm gonna save the beautiful damsels of the world!
Yuna, Vampire Seeker.evoFlair_: Found you, vampire! You fiend! Carrying off all these beautiful damsels! I'm so jeal—I, I mean! I'm so angry at you! Prepare yourself for... Hm? You're actually kind of fetching yourself... Lemme just take a closer... Hey, come back!

Righteous Devil.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Bane and Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
Righteous Devil.baseFlair_: One nondescript day the seemingly interminable war ended. But not a soul stood atop the battlefield to claim victory—that is, except a blood-starved demon.
Righteous Devil.evoFlair_: Lusting only to reap blood and flesh wholesale, this devil saves his sickle for the battlefield. A merciless judge, he metes out bladed justice to the wretched who devote themselves to petty squabbles.

Terror Demon.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Whenever an allied follower evolves, this follower gains +1/+0 while in your hand.
Terror Demon.baseFlair_: Feast on their terror, for our reign begins now! From the Depths, we have arisen—let us feast on every pigment of life.
Terror Demon.evoFlair_: Silently expanding, our malevolence lurks and creeps in the shadows. Don't look behind you now... Gwahaha!

Narmaya, Ephemeral Blade.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower. Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10 if Vengeance is not active for you.
Narmaya, Ephemeral Blade.baseFlair_: D-do you dislike me now? What did I do wrong this time? Maybe I was standing too close? I guess I was getting a little too familiar...
Narmaya, Ephemeral Blade.evoFlair_: So... You weren't mad at me? Thank goodness! If there's anything you want me to do for you, let me know! I'll be right there to take care of it all!

Flauros.baseEffect_:
Invocation: During your third turn or later, if your leader has taken damage for the fourth time this turn, invoke this card.
Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Flauros.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Flauros.baseFlair_: Let me weave you a lie. My eyes shoot flame, but I would never harm a living creature. I have a great many other tales to spin for the ears of ill-mannered louts such as yourself.
Flauros.evoFlair_: I see my words fall upon deaf ears. Pity. I will have to find some other way to teach you of wisdom, battle, and honor.

Trill, Devilish Idol.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Aza & Iza, Feline Maids or Demon Song into your hand.
Trill, Devilish Idol.baseFlair_: Thanks for coming out to our concert tonight! Are you ready Aza? Ready Iza? Then it's time for our first number: "The Hottest Spring in Hell"!
Trill, Devilish Idol.evoFlair_:
It's nearly time for our finale! Don't cry, now, or you'll make us cry, too! Here goes "Rivenbrandt Requiem"!
Ugh, I'm beat... I deserve a nice long bath when I get home.

Azazel, the Depraved.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 6 damage instead.
Azazel, the Depraved.evoEffect_: Evolve: Change your leader's maximum defense to 10. Give your leader the following effect - Can't take more than 3 damage at a time. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Azazel, the Depraved.baseFlair_: If you have pride in your heart, you must hunger for downfall. Because you can be nothing but powerless while bound by the rules of gods... In the depths of depravity and downfall, your pride will shine as never before.
Azazel, the Depraved.evoFlair_: Falling on account of so-called morals and ideals... Pathetic! Those too afraid to choose the fallen path themselves are doomed to constant change. But a proud soul like mine is wholly eternal!

Soul Dealer.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to your leader. X equals half your leader's defense, rounded down.
Soul Dealer.baseFlair_: If you wish to be protected from this abominable light, then give your soul—half your life—to the darkness. Do so, and the devil will rise from the darkness and stain this awful light a beautiful jet black.
Soul Dealer.evoFlair_: Blood is not sufficient. Flesh will not satisfy. The devil demands your soul, and he will offer you great things in return. Come now—the light will not satisfy your urges.

Belphegor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10 if Vengeance is not active for you.
Belphegor.baseFlair_: The gold you humans talk about is worthless and pointless, so take as much as you want. But I expect you to give it to me—give me what I really want.
Belphegor.evoFlair_: To me, gold isn't some flashy yellow metal. It's your soul gleaming red. And now that I've made your wishes come true, I'll be taking that soul.

Venomfang Medusa.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Serpent.
At the start of your turn, if at least 2 allied Serpents are in play, 2 Serpents combine to become Medusiana.
Venomfang Medusa.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Serpent.
At the start of your turn, if at least 2 allied Serpents are in play, 2 Serpents combine to become Medusiana.
Venomfang Medusa.baseFlair_:
Her purple, serpentine locks form one massive snake. Accompanied by countless smiling fangs, this young girl steps back into the night.
"We'll show you everything we've got!"
Venomfang Medusa.evoFlair_:
Fear and worship the snake goddess. Her powers released, she will consume everything under the night sky.
"I can do everything that my sisters can!"

Diabolus Agito.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +0/+X. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Diabolus Agito.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects or attacks.)
Diabolus Agito.baseFlair_: This world can be totaled and calculated in its entirety. Four fundamental operations—all this demon requires to disentangle the enigmas of our realm.
Diabolus Agito.evoFlair_: This demon presides over all calculation. Before him, all mysteries unravel to reveal their solutions, from the lifespan of man to the pigment of heaven.

Laura, Enraged Commander.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, give a Bloodcraft follower in your hand Storm. If this is your tenth turn or later and Vengeance is active for you, give all Bloodcraft followers in your hand Storm instead.
Laura, Enraged Commander.baseFlair_: The battlefield is my stage and the chorus of cannon fire, my applause! Blacken the skies; char them till they can scream no more! Sweet destruction! Beautiful annihilation!
Laura, Enraged Commander.evoFlair_: Battle is just unrehearsed drama with an all but certain conclusion. Now, go! Secure my conquest for glory, triumph, and victory! And let's end this farce!

Aragavy the Berserker.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Aragavy the Berserker.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. If you have at least 4 play points, use 4 play points and deal 8 damage to all other followers instead.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Aragavy the Berserker.baseFlair_: Thundering pulse. Soft sighs. Those shrill cries of yours ring in my ears. One. Two. Ahhh, I can't wait to wolf you all down! I'll string you up, dress you, and devour you to the marrow!
Aragavy the Berserker.evoFlair_: The young are always hungry, always clamoring to be fed. We hunt, feed our young, hunt, feed ourselves—gradually overrunning the world. One. Two. No matter how many of you there are, it'll never be enough! We'll string you up, dress you, and devour you to the marrow!

Neun, Daybreak Vampire.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If any other allied Machina followers are in play, destroy 1 and evolve this follower.
Neun, Daybreak Vampire.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, summon 2 Assembly Droids. Then, if at least 10 allied Machina followers have been destroyed this match, give all other allied Machina followers +2/+2 and Ward.
Neun, Daybreak Vampire.baseFlair_: My blood, you sought to taint with holy water—but these gears are my dam. My heart, you sought to still with silver bullets—but the moon is my shield. Even the sun, which sought to end my being, cannot pierce these steel wings. Finally... I can laugh when day breaks.
Neun, Daybreak Vampire.evoFlair_: Track the frenzied threads back to their source, and look into the six eyes of the web-spinner. Watch as it breaks from its nest, rushes into the sun. The spider finds its prey; the struggle between freedom and restraint begins.

XIV. Luzen, Temperance.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (0): Put an Unselfish Grace into your hand. If Avarice is active for you, put an Insatiable Desire into your hand instead.
----------
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
While this follower is in play, your leader has the following effects.
-Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
-Whenever your leader takes damage, reduce the enemy leader's maximum defense by 3.
XIV. Luzen, Temperance.baseFlair_:
Truth is waste. Your world has been reshaped.
I am Temperance, patron of austerity.
There is only one necessity:
Reality.
XIV. Luzen, Temperance.evoFlair_:
Hopes. Dreams. Memories. These are tools of hedonism.
Sever all luxuries; leave only thy corporeal self.
Discard excess. Learn what is needed:
Rationality.

Darhold, Abyssal Contract.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, destroy an enemy follower, then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Darhold, Abyssal Contract.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to your leader. Summon a Dire Bond.
Darhold, Abyssal Contract.baseFlair_: Binding contracts persist in the depths of darkness. Some mortals use death as an escape clause, but demons don't negotiate. Remember well. The devil stains this awful light in beautiful jet black.
Darhold, Abyssal Contract.evoFlair_: A true contract is not written, nor is it signed in blood; it is bound to the soul. Share your sins to conquer pain and misery. Favors are repaid in kind, for the devil is more trustworthy than the gods.

Crimson Purge.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Destroy an enemy follower.
Crimson Purge.baseFlair_: A crimson rose blooms in the dead of night.

Night Horde.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Forest Bats.
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied Forest Bats in play.
Night Horde.baseFlair_: Now, swarms of darkness, devour the light.

Devil Blade.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, all allied followers gain +1/+0. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Devil Blade.baseFlair_: The first hundred are to be torn apart like straw. The next ten should be rusted in sunlight and forged in moonlight. With the final one, the blade shall bloom with crimson in the shadows, fresh with blood. —Enchanted Blade Arts, Chapter 3

Gluttonous Gorger.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
Gluttonous Gorger.baseFlair_: Driven by an insatiable hunger, the beast roars as it goes in search of its next prey.
Gluttonous Gorger.evoFlair_: No matter how many creatures it consumes, the beast is never sated. Its howls ring out, echoing as though they were lamentations.

Soul Navigator.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and summon a Forest Bat.
Soul Navigator.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and summon a Forest Bat.
Soul Navigator.baseFlair_: You want to make a deal with me? Okay, if you say so. As long as you hold up your end of the bargain, my associates and I will help you out.
Soul Navigator.evoFlair_: Sure, a deal's a deal. My associates and I pledge our loyalty to you. As long as we keep getting our dues, of course.

Big Knuckle Bodyguard.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Big Knuckle Bodyguard.baseFlair_: Worthless geeks everywhere! This is boring, way too boring. I'm gonna finish you with these fists.
Big Knuckle Bodyguard.evoFlair_: Can't anyone satisfy me? If you can buck these knuckles, I'll bust out this hammer as your reward.

Delirious Demon.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers and your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +0/+1 and an additional Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers and your leader.
Delirious Demon.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers and your leader.
Delirious Demon.baseFlair_: "His rage can't be contained." The exorcist whispered painfully. "Every living creature irritates him."
Delirious Demon.evoFlair_: "He won't listen to reason," said the exorcist, picking up his weapon with a trembling hand. "Even his own life force irritates him."

Aloof Archfiend.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw 2 cards.
Aloof Archfiend.baseFlair_:
Beyond our walls, there roams a raging fiend. He swings his hatchet, and the earth trembles; he raises his voice, and the sky splits. We have just one wish. O, tempestuous fiend, leave at once so our village may know peace again.
—Village Annals, Dry Season
Aloof Archfiend.evoFlair_: The raging fiend has gone—and it is only now we discover his true intentions. He was our ward and savior; it was he who chased away beast and monster alike. O, proud and aloof archfiend, may you appear before our village once again. —Village Annals, Rainy Season

Vampire Bard.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat.
Vampire Bard.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat.
Vampire Bard.baseFlair_: Hark upon my ballad, bloodkin. It is a tale of a dark hero, a servant loyal to the pursuit of peace. Much was his suffering under the gaze of the sun.
Vampire Bard.evoFlair_: And so the song does tell that in the shadows of shining heroes our kind did dwell. I only pray my essence lives on for all eternity amidst its lilt and cadence.

Squall Lancer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
Squall Lancer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Squall Lancer.baseFlair_: Isn't the rain wonderful? No matter how many people you run through, you don't have to worry about blood stains because they'll all be washed away...
Squall Lancer.evoFlair_: Tonight's rain is especially heavy. The souls trapped in my lance are weeping, and I think you might be just the person to go console them!

Vlad.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Vlad.baseFlair_: His body is that of a man, but his heart is that of a demon, monster, or beast. He indiscriminately pierces both allies and foes, sending them to the shadowy beyond. He is none other than Vlad Dracula, and mortals call him the Impaler.
Vlad.evoFlair_: After bathing in the blood of countless victims, his hair and eyes took on a crimson hue as if in testament to his malice, and his body finally changed to reflect his evil heart. He is none other than Vlad Dracula, and mortals detest him as the vampire that he is.

Dark Airjammer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower that costs 2 play points or less from your deck into play. Repeat once if Vengeance is active for you.
Dark Airjammer.baseFlair_: No one knows what it seeks or where it's going. The ghost ship traverses the vast seas and skies, and shadowy figures emerge from within.
Dark Airjammer.evoFlair_: No one knows what it seeks or where it's going. The ship sways back and forth as it goes, and warped lights flicker from within.

Scarlet Sabreur.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Then restore 2 defense to your leader.
Scarlet Sabreur.baseFlair_: I thirst and I ache for it. You don't mind, do you? Let me drink the last drop.
Scarlet Sabreur.evoFlair_: Red, crimson, vermillion—these colors make me go mad. You wouldn't mind, would you? One bite's all I need!

Bandersnatch.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a follower that costs at least 6 play points from your deck into play.
Bandersnatch.baseFlair_: Beg for your life if you value it. For these frumious jaws crush all. The terrible Bandersnatch! —Poems of Unbeing
Bandersnatch.evoFlair_: Wherefore your fury, and wherefore your cry? Speed hence while the moon shines, for if not you shall be chased, and if not you will die. Vanish with the night, Bandersnatch! —Poems of Unbeing

Salome.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Salome.baseFlair_: Princess of Bones, Lady of Blood, Beheader's Blade, Crimson Guillotine. Call me whatever you wish. They're your last words, after all.
Salome.evoFlair_: I love people, but what captivates me isn't a clear complexion or broad shoulders, nor is it status or wealth. I'm after something purer. Life. Warm and throbbing in my palm.

Metal-Blade Demon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied Machina followers in play.
Metal-Blade Demon.evoEffect_: Evolve: If you have at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Metal-Blade Demon.baseFlair_: I hate to say it, but it seems monsters even crueler than vampires have learned to use machines—namely demons. Staking hearts is going to be a lot harder from now on, since we've got all manner of metal to pierce through. —Vampire Hunter's Notes, Part 2
Metal-Blade Demon.evoFlair_: Ah, so many fascinating transformations are upon us. While my kind are feature complete, so to speak, we do have our flaws. Perhaps if we, too, were to adapt the usage of machines... —Vampire's Account, Part 2

Moonlight Vampire.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet. If Wrath is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. Otherwise, restore 4 defense to your leader.
Moonlight Vampire.baseFlair_: Creatures of the night live by one, simple rule—serve the strong, trample the weak! You request my aid? Then prove your worth, worm.
Moonlight Vampire.evoFlair_: I must say, I'm somewhat impressed. Why, I may just promote you to chief worm! Very well. I'll lend you my strength. Now, be a good minion and stay out of my way.

Erinyes.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and a random enemy follower if the leader's defense is higher than yours.
Erinyes.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and a random enemy follower if the leader's defense is higher than yours.
Erinyes.baseFlair_: A divine being and mistress of vengeance. She gets her power from the shattered remnants of humans' hopes and dreams.
Erinyes.evoFlair_: Her greatest joy is fanning the flames of hatred in the hearts of the downtrodden. She hopes that those tiny flames will one day grow into a world-devouring conflagration.

Mastema.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Mastema.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Mastema.baseFlair_: The black-winged maiden smiles seductively and glances meaningfully down at the abyss. Take her hand and you'll never set foot on the surface again.
Mastema.evoFlair_: The black-winged temptress grins in satisfaction when you assent to step into the darkness. For she is no mere maiden, but the monarch who rules the abyss...

Fulminous Demon.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders if Vengeance is not active for you. Deal 1 damage to all enemies instead if Vengeance is active for you.
Fulminous Demon.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders if Vengeance is not active for you. Deal 1 damage to all enemies instead if Vengeance is active for you.
Fulminous Demon.baseFlair_: If fairness is the true nature of gods, then this thunder is divine. My lightning will pull all heaven and earth apart and reduce them to dust.
Fulminous Demon.evoFlair_: Praise the divine lightning? So foolish, so prideful! The gods aren't the only ones who destroy the heavens. But I'll show you who will with this power.

Oldblood King.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Storm until the end of the turn.
Oldblood King.baseFlair_: A hundred years is fine, and so's a thousand. But what happens when life continues on a hundred times, a thousand times more? Even if the body resists decay, the mind cannot. It will simply go mad. —An adventurer
Oldblood King.evoFlair_: It has no intelligence and cannot reason. But it's lived a thousand years a thousand times over. One look in its eyes and you'll begin to decay. —An adventurer

Evil Eye Demon.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Evil Eye Demon.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
Evil Eye Demon.baseFlair_: This eye burns with contempt, twisting and gnarling my charred physique. This pain... It's all your fault! Until my last breath, I will detest you!
Evil Eye Demon.evoFlair_: You've branded me as evil, but have you taken a look at yourselves? I was born with this hatred. But this pain you've inflicted upon me... It is you who are the truly evil ones here!

Apostle of Lust.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader and draw 2 cards. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader, and your opponent draws 1 card.
Apostle of Lust.baseFlair_: People fear what is different, but if we meld our dissimilarities, then there would be nothing left to fear, so go forth and convulse en masse. Assenters, dissenters, and objectors alike, come together in commensurate affection.
Apostle of Lust.evoFlair_:
The Third Provision: Intermingle
All conflicts and wars are the product of discrepant views and insufficient empathy. Mix, intermingle, ravish, enrapture, and save this world. —Teachings from the Manor of Lust

Sharanzaya, Masked Mayhem.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain Storm.
Sharanzaya, Masked Mayhem.baseFlair_: Wahahaha! You've really shaped up from the sad little crybaby you used to be! We've been fated to fight since birth! So let's make the most of it! Taste my ultimate technique! Nightmarish Descent!
Sharanzaya, Masked Mayhem.evoFlair_:
Nightmarish Descent! That single attack brings devastation raining down from the sky, drilling through the earth just like Venomous Stakes!
—The mysterious Masked Scholar

Balto, Malice Deflector.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and 5 damage to an enemy follower.
Balto, Malice Deflector.baseFlair_: I'm a greedy man—there is no limit to my desires. So I'll take my compensation up front, thanks. Don't expect any more work from me than you pay for.
Balto, Malice Deflector.evoFlair_: Your delusion in itself is my compensation. I feed on humans' feelings and their greed. When I tire of yours... I'm sure I'll devour you too.

Beast Dominator.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Then give -2/-0 to this follower.
Beast Dominator.evoEffect_: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Then give -2/-0 to this follower.
Beast Dominator.baseFlair_: Hey, why so glum! You're mine now. You should be delighted! Come on, smile! I want to see you smile!
Beast Dominator.evoFlair_: All you have to do is listen to what I say. You're a good kid, and I want to give you a reward. Something special. Here, taste this wine; it's made with my own blood. Taste it, and we'll be bound together forever.

Bloody Mary.baseEffect_: During your turn, deal any damage dealt to your leader to the enemy leader instead.
Bloody Mary.evoEffect_: During your turn, deal any damage dealt to your leader to the enemy leader instead.
Bloody Mary.baseFlair_: Blood is so very hot and stimulating. You really should try coloring yourself with it.
Bloody Mary.evoFlair_: Injury, pain, seeping blood... I simply revel in them! I'll stain you in blood again and again.

Jormungand.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when your leader takes damage, deal 3 damage to all enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Jormungand.baseFlair_: Those who revere the gods reach sacred lands, but those who revile the gods arrive at terrifying places. The serpent's writhing foretells naught but woe. Your only hope is to cast off your humanity—so go ahead, drink up. —The Forgotten Play, Witch's lines
Jormungand.evoFlair_: The serpent's bite delivers curses, not venom. These hexes have the power to destroy humans, twisting their very form. Flesh melted, bones broken—you'll become the beast of the demon's land. —The Forgotten Play, Witch's lines

Nacht.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Nacht.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Nacht.baseFlair_: You called us demons. You called us monsters. You called for our demise. Unfortunately for you, we survived. Now its our turn to hunt—this night of enchantment has just begun!
Nacht.evoFlair_: You tried to drown us. Now we will drown this world into the abyss—hatred, disgust, all of your despicable traits. Your nights of tranquility have ended, for this night will be stained in blood!

Thunder Behemoth.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Give your leader the following effect: At the start of your next turn, lose 3 play points.
Thunder Behemoth.baseFlair_: Ominous clouds, thunderous tremors, a strike of lightning. The manifestation of fury is an unyielding hammer—incinerating all fighting spirit and divine wills.
Thunder Behemoth.evoFlair_: Pressure builds and releases, tearing the heavens asunder. The manifestation of cruelty is an inescapable hammer—all shall be eradicated without discrimination.

Milnard, Dark Fiend.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain Storm.
Fanfare: If you have 2 other cards or less in your hand, gain Drain. If you have 0 cards in your hand, gain +3/+1.
Milnard, Dark Fiend.baseFlair_: Eat humans? I could never. Like, they're huuuman—they're weaker than the bugs we've got in hell. No, no, it's way more fun to cut them, dice them, slice them, stab them, impale them, maim them... I could go on!
Milnard, Dark Fiend.evoFlair_: Humans scream, like, a lot. Oh, and they cry too. I guess that's how you know they're squishy. Do you know how to make 'em real upset? It's all right if you don't know—I'll show ya...

Medusa, Evil-Eyed Serpent.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 3 Serpents.
At the end of your turn, give Bane to a random allied Serpent.
At the end of your turn, give Ward to a random allied Serpent.
Medusa, Evil-Eyed Serpent.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Medusiana into your hand.
At the end of your turn, give Bane to a random allied Serpent.
At the end of your turn, give Ward to a random allied Serpent.
Medusa, Evil-Eyed Serpent.baseFlair_:
"You'll pay if you take us lightly!"
Anacondas, vipers, pythons. All snakes become her shield.
"I'll teach you how scary snakes can be!"
They bare their fangs at any who would trespass against their princess.
Medusa, Evil-Eyed Serpent.evoFlair_:
"Come, Medusiana!"
One that could swallow a dragon whole, answers her call.
"Playtime is over! Rip them to shreds!"
All those who oppose the princess of snakes will find themselves as mere field mice before her noble steed.

Savage Hunt.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Draw a card if Vengeance is active for you.

Burning Constriction.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Then, if Vengeance is active for you, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
Burning Constriction.baseFlair_: Just try running from these silver chains! You'll be cleansed by their blue flames yet!

Diabolic Drain.baseEffect_:
If Vengeance is active for you, this card costs 4 less.
----------
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Diabolic Drain.baseFlair_: Why stop there when there's much more life left?

Imp Lancer.baseFlair_: Revolution? Rebellion? Simply delightful! I just live for chaos! May you be the first witness to my swift and ghastly reign of terror! Well, don't just stand there. Help me!
Imp Lancer.evoFlair_: War is just wonderful! Nothing beats the sight of fallen soldiers! Let's make this battle so gruesome they'll talk about it for ages. Well, come on! Hurry up and let me do my work!

Rampaging Giant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if Vengeance is active for you.
Rampaging Giant.baseFlair_: His skin is like steel, impervious to inferior blades.
Rampaging Giant.evoFlair_: Unbreakable mettle encased in impenetrable steel.

Demonic Thrall.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if Vengeance is active for you.
Demonic Thrall.baseFlair_: The lowly demon was summoned to the battlefield bound in chains. Even soldiers were reduced to shreds before the creature's overwhelming violence.
Demonic Thrall.evoFlair_: The beastly demon broke its chains to taste freedom at last. No longer a thrall to its master's orders, the demon was instead bound by its feral instincts.

Brazen Demoness.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader.
Brazen Demoness.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader.
Brazen Demoness.baseFlair_: Present your offering to me, little one, and I'll obey your every command. I'll even call you master...
Brazen Demoness.evoFlair_: As long as you do what I require, I'll follow you. I'll fulfill my end of our bargain. Now what do you wish of me, my sweet master?

Giant Cobra.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Serpents.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If Vengeance is active for you, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Giant Cobra.baseFlair_: Poison is medicine. Take, for example, the venomous cobra: the potent poison it stores in its body acts as a catalyst for the unbelievable speed of its growth.
Giant Cobra.evoFlair_: Medicine is poison. Take, for example, the cobra's venom: it blisters human skin and eats away at rock and earth.

Flood Behemoth.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Flood Behemoth.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Flood Behemoth.baseFlair_: That day we learned that anything big enough can threaten our world. —Battalion report
Flood Behemoth.evoFlair_: A single swipe of the behemoth's hand was all it took to scatter three platoons. Honestly, to see it felt more like looking at a natural disaster than at combat. —Battalion report

Fenrir.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Fenrir.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Fenrir.baseFlair_: The twilight signals the coming of the demon wolf and her sinister howl. The freezing wind signals the death of a god at her fangs. Her fangs should be feared; her claws rend the battlefield. —Tale of the Demon Wolf
Fenrir.evoFlair_: The demon wolf who hungers for blood will consume the sky and crush the earth. She hunts tirelessly for the heart of the spear-wielding god. Her hatred should be feared; her fury will bring the end. —Tale of the Demon Wolf

Pommern, Erste's Pride.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to this follower.
Pommern, Erste's Pride.baseFlair_: I do say, any cretin foolish enough to make an enemy of the Erste Empire will be met with the fiercest opposition! Or I am not captain of the finest imperial forces!
Pommern, Erste's Pride.evoFlair_: To think that you vermin would be this strong... You've left me with no choice. I'll show you the power of dark essence, the very limits of our technology! Behold our true strength!

Pactbound Demon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw 3 cards.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Pactbound Demon.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Pactbound Demon.baseFlair_: What is treasure to your eyes is trash to a demon's. Yet you covet what is treasure to a demon's eyes as well. No negotiation is needed when one deals in deception. —Words of Belphegor
Pactbound Demon.evoFlair_: The truly wise wouldn't go around striking deals with demons. Fools who thought themselves to be cunning all met with the same fate... I have all the time in the world to play with my food. —Words of Belphegor

Medusa.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Medusa.evoEffect_: Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Medusa.baseFlair_: You've got something against my hair? Well, you've got guts; I'll give you that! I don't take kindly to those who mock my flowing locks though. Prepare to be turned to stone!
Medusa.evoFlair_: Cry all you like; your fate is sealed! You've insulted me, and now it's time to pay the price! Show me your snakiest, dear little darlings!

Phantom Cat.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader for each Neutral card drawn.
Phantom Cat.baseFlair_: Humans are beasts, beasts that prowl in search of answers. Such peculiar creatures! Meow-ha-ha!
Phantom Cat.evoFlair_: Answers aren't anything you find through searching. Like shadows, they're always there by your side. Meow-ha-ha!

Heartsick Demon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, subtract 1 from the cost of 2 Bloodcraft cards (excluding Heartsick Demon) in your hand.
Heartsick Demon.baseFlair_: Tragic tales of lost love, romance between beast and lady—it is but words that bind their passions. Young romps take to the skies of blue, a couple's ardent devotion, fated life-long loves! As a watchful guardian over their love, I must see all stories through to the end.
Heartsick Demon.evoFlair_:
There's nothing quite like it... The joy of shared bliss, the pity of a missed connection.
Those two... They're together! They're a couple!
Oh, I musn't engage, but my feelings of passion must be heard! Ah... Love! Wonderful, bittersweet love!

Moriana, Shadow Devil.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, recover 2 evolution points.
Moriana, Shadow Devil.baseFlair_:
She values her friends and wants no harm to come to them. If only she were to fight alone, the others wouldn't need to get hurt.
"May... Leave this to the grown-ups!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 3
Moriana, Shadow Devil.evoFlair_:
She's their valued friend, so they don't want her to be all alone. And if everyone fought together, she wouldn't need to be.
"You're a nincompoop, Moriana!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 4

Nightprowl Vampire.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Last Words: If it is your turn, put a random Natura card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers instead.
Nightprowl Vampire.baseFlair_:
Vampires are creatures who have cast off the shackles of fate to live beyond the bounds of common sense. Even so. That one. Is. Different. The way. She moves. Should I. Give in? To madness?
—A historian's scrawled journal entry
Nightprowl Vampire.evoFlair_:
Unshackled. Unshackled. Shackledun. Dun, dun, dun. Dunshackledun vampire. She will. Take it. From you. What you cherish. Most. With hands. Fingers. Face. She will. Devour. Your strength. Born. Of madness.
—Twisted scrawl

Queen Vampire.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats and give allied Forest Bats Ward.
Queen Vampire.baseFlair_: I use blood to grant myself eternal life. To fulfill a promise I made long ago. To fulfill a vow I made in the name of joy and in the name of loss.
Queen Vampire.evoFlair_: My eternal life has but one purpose: to fulfill the promise I made on the day of the blood exchange. It is a vow that transcends eternity.

Carabosse, Wicked Fairy.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects - You will not gain a play point at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, draw a card and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (These effects last for the rest of the match.)
Carabosse, Wicked Fairy.baseFlair_: The flow of time is difficult to stop for most, but for me it's so simple. Stay beautiful and dream for eternity.
Carabosse, Wicked Fairy.evoFlair_: Permanence is just another name for death. But what of it? In this world nothing's sweeter than eternity!

Vania, Nightshade Vampire.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 6 play points, and Vengeance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a Kind Queen Vania or Blood Queen Vania.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to both leaders. Then summon a Forest Bat.
Vania, Nightshade Vampire.baseFlair_: Someday I'm gonna be a queen. Hey, bloodkin, what should I do then?
Vania, Nightshade Vampire.evoFlair_: Hey, bloodkin! You're still gonna be my bloodkin even after I'm queen. Stay with me forever and ever, and be nice to me forever and ever!

Slayn, Steelwrought Vampire.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 7 other cards in your hand, gain Drain.
Fanfare: If you have 3 to 5 other Machina cards in your hand, gain Rush. If you have at least 6 other Machina cards in your hand, gain Storm.
Slayn, Steelwrought Vampire.baseFlair_: I've finally understood why the monsters were collecting mechanical parts. Holy water, sunlight, stakes—nothing penetrates the carapace they've made. That armor is nigh invulnerable. —Vampire Hunter's Notes, Part 3
Slayn, Steelwrought Vampire.evoFlair_: Go ahead, bask in the sweet luster of my steel. You can see why I've adorned my claws—and my very body—in this material. Is there a more fitting symbol of flawlessness? Is there a more fitting path to new, bloodred beauty?

Yuzuki, Righteous Demon.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Deal 1 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy 2 enemy followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, give your leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, lose 2 play points.
Yuzuki, Righteous Demon.baseFlair_: I have no tolerance for boors. They are not welcome on my island. If you insist on running amok here... prepare yourself. My blade is of far more costly make than you.
Yuzuki, Righteous Demon.evoFlair_: Cross your heart and hope to die. Your drunken fugue ends here. You'll pay the price of your rampage with your head. Those are the rules.

Nerea, Beast Empress.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Flood Behemoth and give it Ward. If Avarice is active for you, evolve this follower.
Nerea, Beast Empress.evoEffect_: Strike: Give -2/-2 to all enemy followers. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
Nerea, Beast Empress.baseFlair_: Scared? Don't be. You're mine... My lovely, lovely toy. I will let nothing touch you.
Nerea, Beast Empress.evoFlair_: Your pleasure... is my pleasure. I will protect you. I will sweep you into my chest; I will bare my fangs at your enemies. Now come, my toy. Entertain me.

Stolen Life.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then give +3/+3 to a random allied follower.
Stolen Life.baseFlair_: "Vampire, prepare yourse..." —Last words of a vampire hunter

Demonic Storm.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to all allies and enemies.
Demonic Storm.baseFlair_: Tonight blood will rain from the skies.

Reach of the Archdemon.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to all followers.
If Vengeance is active for you, recover 3 play points.

Gunnlod.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain +3/+0. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Gunnlod.evoEffect_: Clash: Gain +3/+0. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Gunnlod.baseFlair_: From the day that I vowed my love to him, everything that I am became his. But, no, I don't believe I'm being used. After all, he told me that he would make me his wife!
Gunnlod.evoFlair_: There's no way he would betray me. What good would it do him? I won't let him run, I won't let him go, and I won't let him off. Haha—he's going to have to take responsibility.

Abyss Beast.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
Abyss Beast.baseFlair_: With every cry of rage his chains grow tighter, and every squeeze of the cold metal against his raw wounds feeds his anger. And so the cycle of torment continues.
Abyss Beast.evoFlair_: Eventually the chains were unable to contain his fury. Set free from his purgatory, he rampaged through the underworld in search of those that shackled him.

Alucard.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader if Vengeance is active for you.
Alucard.baseFlair_: My brothers! Have pride in your lineage, your tenacity, your wisdom, your eternal lives! We are the chosen ones! We are the bloodline of darkness!
Alucard.evoFlair_: Feel the dark blood coursing through your veins, my brothers, and kneel before me! I am the true leader of our bloodline! Bow your heads and offer your eternal loyalty!

Frenzied Juggernaut.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Frenzied Juggernaut.baseFlair_: Pathetic weaklings! Know why you stand before me. Without destruction there can be no creation!
Frenzied Juggernaut.evoFlair_: Tremble in awe before the destruction I sow! Soon your body and soul will be no more!

Ice Blade Warfiend.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, draw a card.
Ice Blade Warfiend.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, draw a card.
Ice Blade Warfiend.baseFlair_: The battlefield is my beloved; I want to keep fighting even after my mortal days are through. So I bound myself to a demon, thus transforming the warrior I was into the warfiend I am.
Ice Blade Warfiend.evoFlair_: My cheeks warped as my fangs grew in, and my forehead split to make way for my horns. But these trivial changes did nothing to change what I really want: war. War that rages throughout the ages!

Soul Dominator.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever another follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
Soul Dominator.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever another follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
Soul Dominator.baseFlair_: I'd be happy to help relieve you of all those pesky attachments. So satisfy me with what remains of your soul!
Soul Dominator.evoFlair_: I know how much it hurts and how irritating it is, so offer yourself to me as sustenance. I'll transform your lowly regrets into sublime tragedy!

Emeralda, Demonic Officer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet. Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
Emeralda, Demonic Officer.baseFlair_: Time for fun and games! The enemy forces will be wiped out at my hands, and I'll bear victory and glory.
Emeralda, Demonic Officer.evoFlair_: Games are only fun for the victor! Losing's not worth a thing whether you're trounced or knicked. That's why I'll win and keep winning.

Stheno.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Serpents.
Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Stheno.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Stheno.baseFlair_:
Her mystic eye feeds on the mind, while her scalekin devour the body. As the oldest sister of the snake goddess, she is an especially cruel ruler.
"Your body, your mind—I'll consume it all."
Stheno.evoFlair_:
A cold grin crosses her lips as she raises her whip. She enjoys playing with and tormenting her prey, never letting them escape.
"I'll go ahead and say it—I'm not as lenient as my sisters."

Vampire of Calamity.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 1 damage to your leader. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, deal 4 damage to an enemy and restore 4 defense to your leader.
Vampire of Calamity.baseFlair_: Indeed I am the Seven of Swords, mark of inequity. Vows be broken, contracts be damned. I live for myself. I invite you to partake in foul inequity and frivolous injustice for my amusement.
Vampire of Calamity.evoFlair_: Allow me to whisper sweet nightmares into your ears. Everyone is merely a piece in a bigger game. Friend or foe, I make no distinction. I just want to sneer at the world.

Bloodhungry Matriarch.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Bloodhungry Matriarch.evoEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Bloodhungry Matriarch.baseFlair_: It consumed the blood of all living things. It drank until people, dragons, and demons alike ran dry. And each time it drank, its body changed. It gained knowledge. It gained claws and fangs. It gained wings. All it lost was its sanity.
Bloodhungry Matriarch.evoFlair_: It constantly ached. It constantly thirsted. Its irrepressible, unstoppable, inescapable thirst became an urge rooted in its very being. Vampires fear it as the fate that lies in store for those who lose themselves to the thirst.

Calamity Bringer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly destroy 3 other followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 7 damage to your leader.
Calamity Bringer.evoEffect_: Evolve: If Vengeance is active for you, randomly deal 1 damage to a leader or another follower. Do this 9 times.
Calamity Bringer.baseFlair_: Rage burgeons and swathes itself in layers of hatred, despair, ruin, and madness. It spins into the form of a demonic fist. White- and black-winged alike are blown away in a wave of indiscriminate, unreasoning violence.
Calamity Bringer.evoFlair_: No one knows what passion, what frustration, reverberates in that echoing howl. Before they can learn, all who hear it are returned to dust.

Cradle of Dark Divinity.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Cradle of Dark Divinity.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effects.
-At the end of your turn, if you have at least 8 cards in your hand, randomly discard cards until you have 7, then deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals 2 times the number of cards discarded.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Cradle of Dark Divinity.baseFlair_:
At last we have found the dark deity. Let us fall to our knees in reverence. The abnormal bat, werewolf, and vampire. All. Sprang. From this. This font. The font of. Madness. Madness itself.
—Survey team captain's scrawled journal entry
Cradle of Dark Divinity.evoFlair_:
Great, great, great, great, great deity. No. Myself? Your power. Please. Stop? It will spread. Outward. Without. Cease. No good. Madness.
—Twisted scrawl

Arion.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Arion.baseFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. Legend has it he once served as guardian angel to a great prophet, but the truth has been lost to time.
Arion.evoFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. He grants strength to the vengeful, spurring them on to retribution. Legend has it he himself yearns to rebel against the heavens, but the truth has been lost to time.

Furiae.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
Furiae.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
Furiae.baseFlair_: I am the living embodiment of revenge. I draw strength from the darkness within human hearts. Hatred... Envy... Soon this world will be filled with resentment!
Furiae.evoFlair_: The world is filled with hatred, and the time for revenge is upon us! My dark arts shall skewer the hearts of the hypocrites and pin their souls to the tombstone of resentment!

Azazel.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change both leaders' defense to 10, either by restoring defense or by dealing damage.
Azazel.baseFlair_: Though my soul may fall, I shall never bow my head to such weak, stunted creatures as mortals. I still possess a measure of pride.
Azazel.evoFlair_: When the time came, we sounded the battle cry against the gods that deceived us... As fellow traitors, you are now compelled to follow me.

Maelstrom Serpent.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Maelstrom Serpent. Repeat until your area is full if Vengeance is active for you.
Maelstrom Serpent.baseFlair_: The gigantic wriggling serpent is a maelstrom that swallows people, cities, cultures, and ideas alike, like a storm that blows away everything in its path.
Maelstrom Serpent.evoFlair_: The tremendous, frenzied serpent is nothing less than a calamity that swallows the heavens and the earth. It crushes everything without discrimination, returning it to nothingness like some sort of divine judge.

Spawn of the Abyss.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Spawn of the Abyss.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Spawn of the Abyss.baseFlair_: Afflicted and annihilated, one oozes into the ebon abyss. Look and fear, human. There lurks despair: one who preys on iniquitous flesh and the bones of the besmirched. —The Abyss, Chapter 2, Verse 4
Spawn of the Abyss.evoFlair_: Be drenched! Oh, cry out beyond the edge! All is swallowed and flows into the lightless depths. The day has begun—a day longer than eternity and shorter than a blink. —The Abyss, Finale, Verse 1

Darkfeast Bat.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
Darkfeast Bat.baseFlair_: Sleep is a product of the beast that consumes the darkness... and those within it. —Chapter 1, A History of Night
Darkfeast Bat.evoFlair_: Humans came to fear the night on account of something that confines them for all eternity. —Chapter 3, A History of Night

Crimson Rose Queen.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Transform each Bloodcraft card in your hand that originally costs 2 play points or less into a Crimson Burst.
Crimson Rose Queen.baseFlair_: It was humans who spilled blood upon my soil. One good turn deserves another, so I'll see them painted in the same crimson. Yes, caught in my briars and pierced by my thorns... Oh, how red they'll bloom.
Crimson Rose Queen.evoFlair_: The more blood my roses drink, the more crimson they bloom. Yes, this place is my paradise, but for those foolish humans, it is both purgatory and hell.

Seductress Vampire.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if Vengeance is not active for you, reveal it and then banish it. Change your leader's maximum defense to 10.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy, then restore 4 defense to your leader.
Seductress Vampire.baseFlair_:
"That vanilla stuff? A little boring, don't you think?"
One look into her eyes is all it takes to fall into the hells of romance.
"You can have it... a passionate love more intense than anything you've ever felt."
Seductress Vampire.evoFlair_:
"I've lost my taste for those sweet, happy endings."
The incarnation of beauty itself smiled bewitchingly, her prey completely enraptured.
"But you'll give me what I really want, right? All I need is a taste of that bitter, delicious despair."

Spawn of Exile.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Voice of the Abyss.
----------
Ambush.
If Ambush is active for this follower when it attacks, summon 3 Voice of the Abysses.
Spawn of Exile.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
If Ambush is active for this follower when it attacks, summon 4 Voice of the Abysses.
Spawn of Exile.baseFlair_: Avert your eyes. Seal your breath. Even the ends of the heavens are unsafe from its grasps. Before you is a wretched garden, whose thorns prey on the skin of the ignorant. Turn around, and the voices of despair shall call you once more. —The Abyss, Chapter 3, Verse 6
Spawn of Exile.evoFlair_:
His arm, in the deepest depths of its organs. Within the screaming throat, darkness blooms. The nightmare becometh real, bringing forth a new life. Ah... To be born with sin. A new song echoes.
—The Abyss, Finale, Verse 5

Revelation.baseEffect_:
If Vengeance is active for you, this card costs 4 less.
----------
Deal 8 damage to all followers.
Revelation.baseFlair_: It takes days to make a world, but a second to destroy it.

Calamity's Archdemon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to both leaders.
Calamity's Archdemon.baseFlair_: Pain for all the earth. Woe, grief, and misfortune. Now cry your tears of agony!
Calamity's Archdemon.evoFlair_: Cry, and let the pain drive you mad! No matter where you run, the pain I inflict will be there with you.

Temptress Vampire.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Temptress Vampire.baseFlair_: Naked is the human mind in my presence. By all means cling to your doubts. My talents allow me deep inside your mind. Now offer up your life to me.
Temptress Vampire.evoFlair_: Step outside your facade and cast aside your mortal ties, for tonight we revel. Tonight you will surrender to the tantalizing taste of my company!

Diabolus Psema.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Demonic Storm and a Demonic Strike into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, recover 6 play points.
This follower can't be damaged by spells.
Diabolus Psema.evoEffect_: This follower can't be damaged by spells.
Diabolus Psema.baseFlair_: This deception of a world has gone stale. Let the demons roam freely, and reduce it to ash—the fire will rightfully return you all to the void.
Diabolus Psema.evoFlair_: His demons are masters of deception. All colors of the heavens and earth will vanish before them.

Permafrost Behemoth.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader. If Wrath is active for you, deal 10 damage instead.
Permafrost Behemoth.baseFlair_: When her roar resounds, the frozen soil cracks and a beam of light splits the sky. None who live should risk the queen's displeasure.
Permafrost Behemoth.evoFlair_: At her second roar, even the skies shall pale in fear. The haughty queen of frozen earth is an ice-cloaked avatar of terror.

Destructive Succubus.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. If Vengeance is active for you, summon 2 Serpents and give all allied Serpents Ward.
Destructive Succubus.baseFlair_: This is the form you find most alluring? How charming—how obscene—I'm rather fond of it. Well, time to get down to business. I'm here to damn you, after all.
Destructive Succubus.evoFlair_: It's only natural to lose yourself to indulgence and madness. After all, I'm going to make this night last as long as I can. We'll see if your body lasts until morning.

Purson.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (8): Destroy all allied followers and amulets. For each card, put a random follower that costs more than it from your deck into play.
----------
Storm.
Bane.
Purson.baseFlair_: After abducting the bodies of the living, he transfigures them completely. Assembled are instruments of resentment to perform malicious symphonies for his orchestra of slaughter.
Purson.evoFlair_: The tones are striking and coarse—too intense for a human to endure. His otherworldly music twists the ears and crumples the heart. Upon the finale is an ovation from demonkind, as all that remains is death and destruction.

Ruinweb Spider.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (10)
During your turn, whenever another allied amulet comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Ruinweb Spider.
----------
During your turn, when this follower comes into play, all enemy followers can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, it can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
Ruinweb Spider.evoEffect_: Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, it can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
Ruinweb Spider.baseFlair_: Follow not the cursed threads. Their source is illness incarnate, and it spins a web of madness. It speaks in cacophony and abides in distortion. Hear or see it once, and there is no return. Cover your ears; still the sound seeps in. Close your eyes; still the image blazes.
Ruinweb Spider.evoFlair_:
Silver, holy water, even the sun... There is nothing left that can restrain me. You think these tendrils of madness tenacious? Watch me sever them with steel. The moonstruck night is over. And when day breaks, I begin.
—A Vampire with Pure Silver Wings
